---

title: "Get related knowledge base articles"
description: "Returns knowledge base articles related to the ticket's issue context so agents can provide quick resolutions. Supports pagination for large result sets."
sidebar_label: "Get related knowledge base articles"

sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get related knowledge base articles"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/kb-articles"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns knowledge base articles related to the ticket's issue context so agents can provide quick resolutions. Supports pagination for large result sets.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** â€“ Locate the ticket via [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) and extract `Items[].TicketId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with filters for the agent's queue.
2. Extract the identifier from `Items[].TicketId`.
3. Call [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/kb-articles](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-kb-articles) (optionally with `$p`/`$s`) to surface knowledge articles in the support UI.

**Minimal Required Fields**: ticketId (path). Optional pagination: $p, $s.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the ticket used to scope knowledge base recommendations. Obtain via POST /api/v1.0/tickets and extract `Items[].TicketId`.","example":"0466a7fd-6dab-ef11-88cf-6045bdb6b1c8","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchTickets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/tickets","responseField":"Items[].TicketId"},"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"$p","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Zero-based page index for paginating article results.","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0},"example":0},{"name":"$s","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Number of article records per page.","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1},"example":20}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
